Strava Analytics Widgets

Embeddable widgets for your personal website

Stats Card Widget

Displays comprehensive running statistics including weekly distance, average pace, monthly trends, and year-over-year comparisons.

<div id="strava-stats"></div>
<script src="https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/stats-card.iife.js"></script>
<script>
  new StravaStatsCard('#strava-stats', {
    dataUrl: 'https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/weekly-stats.json',
    secondaryDataUrl: 'https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/advanced-stats.json'
  });
</script>

Comparison Chart Widget

Interactive bar chart comparing running statistics across different time periods with multiple visualization options.

<div id="strava-chart"></div>
<script src="https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/comparison-chart.iife.js"></script>
<script>
  new StravaComparisonChart('#strava-chart', {
    dataUrl: 'https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/weekly-stats.json'
  });
</script>

Streak Widget

Visualizes running streaks and activity patterns with time-of-day radar chart and monthly heatmap.

<div id="strava-streak"></div>
<script src="https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/streak-widget.iife.js"></script>
<script>
  new StravaStreakWidget('#strava-streak', {
    dataUrl: 'https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/streaks.json',
    secondaryDataUrl: 'https://your-username.github.io/your-repo/advanced-stats.json'
  });
</script>
